title: download is not working
body: I try to download but it doesent work please help me

replies.body:
Hey there Rachol,

I am able to download the linked file with no issues, however it seems you are experiencing an issue resolving the linked domain.

Can you follow the steps outlined in [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) guide to change to a public DNS server. (In this case, Google DNS)

Please let me know if this resolves your issue.

Also perhaps consider posting on the [EUNE help and support board](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en), you're on the OCE board right now.
